        public java.lang.String getNumber()
        Gets specified Book's serial number.
        Returns:
        number book serial number

      • setNumber

        public void setNumber(java.lang.String number)
        Sets specified Book's serial number.
        Parameters:
        number - desired serial number for a book object.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets specified book object's title.
        Returns:
        name string containing the book's title.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets book object's name to a specified string.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the book

      • isCheckedOut

        public boolean isCheckedOut()
        Checks whether a book is checked out of the library.
        Returns:
        checkedOut true if checkedOut, false if otherwise.

      • setCheckedOut

        public void setCheckedOut(boolean checkedOut)
        Sets book object's status to either checked In or Out.
        Parameters:
        checkedOut - if true, book is listed as checked out in system, if false, listed as not checked out.

      • getDatePublished

        public Date getDatePublished()
        Gets book's publishing date.
        Returns:
        datePublished Date object containing publishing date.

      • setDatePublished

        public void setDatePublished(Date datePublished)
        Sets datePublished for a specific book to specified date.
        Parameters:
        datePublished - specified date of publishing from Date class

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks if two book objects are equivalent by comparing Book name and date published.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - book from Book class to compare against
        Returns:
        true true if books compared have same name and publish date, false if otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns formatted string containing book's number, name, date published, and availability.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        formattedBookInfo String formatted to a specific book, following the format of: "Book# Book.number :: Book.name :: Book.datePublished :: is/is not available .".
